member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.ApplicationLifetime
member.summary: Allows consumers to perform cleanup during a graceful shutdown.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.ApplicationLifetime.ApplicationStarted
member.summary: Triggered when the application host has fully started and is about to wait for a graceful shutdown.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.ApplicationLifetime.ApplicationStopping
member.summary: Triggered when the application host is performing a graceful shutdown. Request may still be in flight. Shutdown will block until this event completes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.ApplicationLifetime.ApplicationStopped
member.summary: Triggered when the application host is performing a graceful shutdown. All requests should be complete at this point. Shutdown will block until this event completes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.ApplicationLifetime.StopApplication
member.summary: Signals the ApplicationStopping event and blocks until it completes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.ApplicationLifetime.NotifyStarted
member.summary: Signals the ApplicationStarted event and blocks until it completes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Hosting.ApplicationLifetime.NotifyStopped
member.summary: Signals the ApplicationStopped event and blocks until it completes.
